item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Just like the meetup name says, this is an open house with model railway demonstrations, rail movies, activities, food service and free parking.

Lot of fun for children and grown-ups.

Check out the website: www.ssmrc.org and the image below for information. If you have any questions, please call Marina at 617-653-0127.

I will send an update with an exact meeting spot for all of us.

See you there!

Marina

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Model Railroad Show & Open House
